S02bsu015_u:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasamaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma karīramaṇḍale ca /
S02bsu015_u:2_1: atha khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrastreṇa parivṛto yena bhagavāṃstenopasamakrāmat /
S02bsu015_u:2_2: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaekānte nyasīda bhagavantametadavocat /
S02bsu015_u:2_3: idaṃ mama bhagavannekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayamekādaśabhiḥ kalpakoṭībhirbhāṣitam /
S02bsu015_u:2_4_0: ahaṃ cettarhi bhāṣiṣyāmi sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśamanāya
S02bsu015_u:2_5_0: nāhaṃ bhagavan samanupaśyāmi [Em_36] sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ
S02bsu015_u:2_5_1: prajāyā yadanena hṛdayena rakṣe kṛte paritre parigrahe śāntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare
S02bsu015_u:2_5_2: śastraparihare viṣaprahāṇe kṛte yaḥ kaścidatikramet na praśamet nedaṃsthānaṃ vidyate
S02bsu015_u:2_6: tadasya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
S02bsu015_u:2_8: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍapratihataraṅgavelakiraṇarājasya nāma tathāgatasya /
S02bsu015_u:2_10: saha pratilaṃbhena daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatāḥ [Em_37] sumukhībhūtā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ /
S02bsu015_u:2_11: evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ hṛdayam tasmāttarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavyam /
S02bsu015_u:2_20: na viṣaṃ na garaṃ na jvaraṃ na śastraṃ kāye kramiṣyati /
S02bsu015_u:2_21: nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyati / nāgninā kālaṃ kariṣyati / nākālamṛtyunā kālaṃca kariṣyati /
S02bsu015_u:3_0: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavanniti daśānāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
S02bsu015_u:3_3: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvasmin karuṇāyanajñānagarbhabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ [Em_38] pratilabdham /
S02bsu015_u:3_4: ye bandhanabaddhā ye badhyaprāptā ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatāḥ tadanenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavāmi /
S02bsu015_u:3_5: yat sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasānāmanena hṛdayena karṣitvā maitracittān dayācittān kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
S02bsu015_u:3_7: ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā cattvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti pacānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravayavaṃ tanvīkariṣyanti /
S02bsu015_u:3_11: sarvamanorathaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi yaśca caturdaśīpaṃcadaśī māmuddiśya upavasati /
S02bsu015_u:3_13: tena nāmadheyamapi grahaṇena bhagavan saha so 'yaṃ buddhakoṭīniyutśatasahasrātirekasamam /
S02bsu015_u:3_17: bhagavānāha / sādhu sādhu kulaputra yat sarvasattvānāmantike evaṃrūpā mahākaruṇā /
S02bsu015_u:3_18: śakṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputraḥ anenopāyena sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitum /
S02bsu015_u:3_20: bhāṣadhvaṃ kulaputra / tataḥ khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva utthāyasanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅga kṛtvā bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya idaṃ hṛdayamāvartayati sma /
S02bsu015_u:6_0: namo ratnatrayāya / nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya /
S02bsu015_u:6_1: tad yathā hāhā hāhā / ime tile cile bhile khile svāhā /
S02bsu015_u:7_1: tadyathā ṭuru ṭuru hā hā hā hā svāhā / dhūpadīpanivedanamantraḥ /
S02bsu015_u:8_0: namo ratnatrayāya / nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāyā mahāsattvāyā /
S02bsu015_u:8_1: tadyathā thiri thiri dhiri dhiri svāhā /
S02bsu015_u:9_0: namo ratnatrayāya / nama āryāvalokiteśvaraya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya /
S02bsu015_u:9_1: tadyathā sāde sāde sidi sidi sudu sudu svāhā /
S02bsu015_u:10_1: mahākāruṇikāya / tadyathā yasi ddhasi cari huru icuruḥ suruḥ muruḥ svāhā /
S02bsu015_u:10_2: homamantraḥ / anena mantreṇa jñātīnāṣṭai(?) ragniṃ prajvālya dadhimadhudhṛtābhyaktānāmahorātrauṣikena ekena triṃśatā homaḥ kāryaḥ /
S02bsu015_u:11_0: namo ratnatrayāya nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya /
S02bsu015_u:11_1: tadyathā ili mili tili tili hili svāhā /
S02bsu015_u:12_0: namo ratnatrayāya / nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya /
S02bsu015_u:12_1: tadyathā piṭi piṭi tiṭi tiṭi viṭi viṭi gaccha gaccha bhagavānāryāvalokiteśvara svabhavanaṃ svabhavanaṃ svāhā /
